introduction.title: Introduction
content: I am a frontend engineer specialized in developing SPAs using React and Vue.js, and recently I have been challenging full-stack development using SSR frameworks such as Next.js and Nuxt.js.
I am also familiar with static typing using TypeScript and test-driven development using Jest and Cypress.

I enjoy keeping up with the latest tech trend and am proactive in learning new tech stack. By leveraging that knowledge, I contribute to improving the quality of not only the project but also the team and the entire product by being involved in technology selection and architecture design.

latest.title: Latest Achievements
content: Development of an on-call system using monitoring tools, Slack App, and Twilio

content.title: LINE Corporation
content.role: A leader of the frontend team

projects.title: LINE MUSIC
projects.description: Maintenance of a web app for a music streaming service

projects.title: Performance Improvement PoC for Native App WebView-specific Web App
projects.description: As the leader of a PoC project, I led the verification and progress of investigating how much switching from a Vue.js SPA to a Next.js+SSR application with an API server built on the same K8s cluster could contribute to improving rendering speed from Native App WebViews. I compiled the findings into information required by the upper planning team.

projects.title: On-call System using Slack App & Twilio
projects.description: Built a system for escalating issues to relevant engineers, PMs, and POs during outages not detected by monitoring tools

projects.title: LINE MUSIC Media Player Development Leader for Browser
projects.description:
Led the browser plugin development project for replacing a highly dependent media player in LINE MUSIC's music streaming service as part of system separation from parent company Naver.
In addition to development, I detailed specifications that were previously black-boxed to avoid impacting existing systems, coordinated migration plans with products providing LINE MUSIC content playback functionality, and automated delivery from internal npm and CDN.

projects.title: Development Leader of Unreleased Web Application
projects.description: As a frontend development leader for an unreleased application involving teams from other products, I was responsible for development, task and progress management, and specification coordination with stakeholders.

projects.title: LINE Ringtone Development Leader
projects.description:
As the frontend development leader for a LINE-specific WebView application that sets ringtones and incoming call sounds for the LINE communication app, I was responsible for development, task management, progress tracking, and API specification coordination with other teams.
Contributed to achieving KPIs as one of the launch features of LINE Yahoo's premium service 'LYP Premium'.

projects.title: Introduction of Automated Testing to LINE MUSIC Web Application
projects.description: Automated 70% of existing manual regression tests for the web application using scheduled Cypress runs in CI, reducing regression QA period by an average of 50%

projects.title: Migration of the LINE MUSIC Web app from Vue 2.x to 3.x
projects.description: A project to migrate the web app of the music streaming service LINE MUSIC from Vue 2.x to 3.x. In addition to migrating the build from vue-cli to vite and introducing unit test from an environment where it was not introduced to testing-library + vitest. Not only did we achieve the removal of libraries that are EOL, but we also improved performance.

projects.title: LINE MUSIC Coin Refund Web App
projects.description: Led frontend development of a refund application for LINE MUSIC's song purchase coin feature discontinuation, complying with Payment Services Act. Managed development task breakdown by requirements and design, coordinated development cycles while actively contributing to development. Successfully used Vue 3 for this application as a proof of concept for LINE MUSIC Web app's migration from Vue 2, helping team members familiarize with the new syntax.

content.name: HTML
contents: HTMLのタグとその役割を理解しており、HTML Living Standard や HTML5の仕様 を読んで理解できる。
適切なタグを適材適所で使い、意味のあるマークアップを作成でき、検索エンジンやスクリーンリーダーにとって理解しやすい構造を意識できる。
`aria-*` 属性を適切に活用し、アクセシブルなWebサイトを構築できる。
JavaScriptとの関係（イベントの伝播、DOMツリーの影響、Shadow DOMなど）を理解している。Web Components（カスタム要素、Shadow DOM）を活用できる。
HTML構造がSEOに与える影響を理解している
HTML Modules や Declarative Shadow DOM など、新しい技術の動向をキャッチアップしている。
